What was the old lady'smotive for such a request, or whether she reallymade such a promise, 1 cannot take upon me to determine; but it is certain her coffin stands uprightin the aisle of the church of Kirkliston, the burialplace of the family."* The talents of this accomplished' race were sufficient to have accounted forthe dignities which many members of the family attained, without any supernatural assistance.
